snippet: A father of six was sentenced to nine months in jail in a rare case in which statements on social media were regarded as a crime.
abstract: Israeli court sentences Palestinian Omar Shalabi to nine months in jail for Facebook posts supporting terrorist attacks.

byline.contributor: Gabby Sobelman contributed reporting from Jerusalem

lead_paragraph: A father of six was sentenced to nine months in jail in a rare case in which statements on social media were regarded as a crime.

headline.main: Israel Jails Palestinian Who Applauded Militant Attacks on Facebook
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Palestinian’s Facebook Posts Lead to a Jail Term for Incitement

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Adalah, The Legal Center for Arab Minority Rights in Israel
